question: What are biochemical catalysts that speed up biochemical reactions?

nodes.text: Inhibitors are biochemical catalysts that speed up biochemical reactions.
Metabolites are biochemical catalysts that speed up biochemical reactions.
Polymers are biochemical catalysts that speed up biochemical reactions.
Enzymes are biochemical catalysts that speed up biochemical reactions.
